Your People Partner and/or Unit head (your manager) will introduce you to your main contact points once you step into your role. \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Some other contacts are common for everyone. Here are the contacts of US groups/teams and their descriptions for you to get more understanding of how they work and how they can help you as a manager. \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-quote\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Note:\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}},{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"#A72014\"}}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"This section just briefly introduces the services that each group provides and the ways they can be useful for an RM. We will look into RM's responsibilities regarding these processes in the next sections.\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-italic\",\"data\":{}},{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"US US People team consists of \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"People Partners\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\", \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"People Advisors\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\", and \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"People Operations\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" specialists (as well as those in People Programs, however, they typically do not work 1:1 with managers or employees, but rather manage broad-reaching programs). People Partners are assigned to specific units (like DEP, GDO, Consulting, BUs, Data practices, etc.) and, as a rule, mostly work with Managers and Unit Heads helping with the strategic management, sensitive issues and unique situations. \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"People Advisors are also assigned to units, alongside People Partners and support all employees within their scope at a tactical level – with everyday workflows, policies, and tasks.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Members of the People Operations team are not tied to locations or specific units — this team keeps employee records and documents as well as manages Payroll, Leaves of Absence (LOAs), Benefits, and other operational processes for all the NA employees. \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"unordered-list\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"PEOPLE PARTNERS\\r\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Our People Partner’s (PP) team is mostly working on a program level and a big part of PP’s responsibility is cooperating with managers and unit heads. Your dedicated PP will reach out to you once you step into the RM role. Alternatively, you can initiate the meeting with your PP yourself. You can find your dedicated People Partner in your Telescope profile -> My Workplace -> People Who May Help -> People Partner.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":42218,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/043c4d11-f89f-477d-8c0b-fa1a5dbd0a52/screen Shot People Advisory (PA) team is a front-line team that regularly meets with and talks to people in your unit (during onboarding and then later as requested/needed), helps them address their questions and deals with/escalates accordingly based on the concerns employees have. Also, the PA team provides you with timely employee-related risks information. Your unit PA can be found in your Telescope Profile -> My Workplace -> People Who May Help -> People
